Package io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.impl.network

Class NetworkImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.network.NetworkX
      • io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.impl.network.NetworkImpl
  • public final class NetworkImpl
extends NetworkX
    The network implementation of LibX. Allows for some networking functions that are required very often.

    • Method Detail

      • getProtocolVersion

        protected java.lang.String getProtocolVersion()
        Description copied from class: NetworkX
        Gets the protocol version for this network. This must be the same on client and server. It's recommended to use whole numbers here and increase them when you change something in a packet format or add a new packet.
        Specified by:
        getProtocolVersion in class NetworkX

      • registerPackets

        protected void registerPackets()
        Description copied from class: NetworkX
        You can register your own packets here. The order is important.
        Specified by:
        registerPackets in class NetworkX

      • updateTE

        public void updateTE​(net.minecraft.world.World world,
                     net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos pos)
        Sends the nbt tag retrieved from TileEntity#getUpdateTag from the tile entity at the given position to all clients tracking the chunk. On the client the tag is passed to TileEntity#handleUpdateTag. Does nothing when called on the client.

      • requestTE

        public void requestTE​(net.minecraft.world.World world,
                      net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos pos)
        Requests the tile entity at the given position from the server. This is automatically done when a TileEntityBase is loaded. The server will send an update packet as described in updateTE(World, BlockPos) to the client. Does nothing when called on the server.
